attributes.name: UXS Body
attributes.description:
A typographic component to render body text

{{uxs-body "Lorem ipsum dolar" 2 true}}

{{#uxs-body level=2 }}Lorem ipsum dolar"{{/uxs-body}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Set the color of the bar.

UXS ships with the following stock color: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .uxs-app-bar--my-custom-color

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the app bar.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • regular
  • extended

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.uxs-bar--my-custom-style

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.
Defaults to no style (inheret from parents).

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
The name of the component. This property also used as the default value for the test selector attribute.
The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: paragraph
arguments.description: If true the component will be rendered as paragraph text e.g. bottom margin between each instance.

arguments.name: scale
arguments.description:
Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXSBreadcrumb
attributes.description:
Display a navigation breadcrumb trail

{{#uxs-breadcrumb as |menu|}}
  {{menu.link "App" "app.home"}}
  {{menu.link "People" "app.people"}}
  {{menu.item "Jim"}}
{{/uxs-breadcrumb}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, "left", "center", "right" or "justified". Defaults to no alignment (inheret)

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: If set to true the menu items will be rendered small (detail) size

attributes.name: UXSBreadcrumb/Item
attributes.description:
Display a clickable item in a uxs-breadcrumb

{{uxs-breadcrumb/item "My Action" onClick=(action "something")}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: If set to true the link will be rendered small (detail) size

arguments.name: onClick
arguments.description: The name of the action to fire on click

attributes.name: UXSBreadcrumb/Link
attributes.description:
Display link to another route within a uxs-menu

{{uxs-breadcrumb/link "My Route" "route.name"}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: If set to true the link will be rendered small (detail) size

attributes.name: UXS Button
attributes.description:
A component to render a simple button

{{uxs-button "BUTTON TEXT"}}

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to disable this button.

This will activate it's disabled style and also prevent any actions from being fired.

arguments.name: loading
arguments.description:
Set to true if the button has already been pressed or should be disabled while another action takes place.

If the loadingText argument has been provided this will be displayed, defaults to "Loading…".

This will activate it's loading style and also prevent any actions from being fired..

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
Add a custom name to your button, used for aria labels & test selectors.

By default this will be the same as the text argument unless you parse a different value.

arguments.name: selected
arguments.description:
Set's the button style to a selected state.

Can be used to toggle buttons or to infer an active state without disabling the buttons action.

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the button.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • contained
  • outlined
  • naked

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.uxs-button--my-custom-style

arguments.name: radius
arguments.description:
Set the border radius of the button.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • square
  • rounded
  • round

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Set the color of the button.

UXS ships with the following stock color: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .uxs-button--my-custom-color

arguments.name: text
arguments.description:
The buttons text, this can be set as the first positional parameter.

It will also default to the components name.

attributes.name: UXS Button Link
attributes.description:
A component to render a link as a simple button

{{uxs-button-link "BUTTON TEXT" "photos.edit" photo}}

{{#uxs-button-link "photos.edit" photo}}
  BUTTON TEXT
{{/uxs-button-link}}

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to disable this button.

This will activate it's disabled style and also prevent any actions from being fired.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
Add a custom name to your button, used for aria labels & test selectors.

By default this will be the same as the text argument unless you parse a different value.

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Set the style of the button.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • contained
  • outlined
  • naked

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.button--my-custom-style

arguments.name: text
arguments.description:
The buttons text, this can be set as the first positional parameter.

It will also default to the components name.

arguments.name: radius
arguments.description:
Set the border radius of the button.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • square
  • rounded
  • round

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Set the color of the button.

UXS ships with the following stock color: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .button--my-custom-color

attributes.name: UXS Caption
attributes.description:
A typographic component to render caption text

{{uxs-caption "Lorem ipsum dolar"}}

{{#uxs-caption}}Lorem ipsum dolar"{{/uxs-caption}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.
Defaults to no style (inheret from parents).

arguments.name: name

The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: tagName

attributes.name: UXS Data
attributes.description:
A component to render group of buttons

{{#uxs-data |data|}}
  {{data.item "Label" "Value"}}
  {{data.item "Another Label" "Value"}}
{{/uxs-data}}

fields.name: base
fields.description: The base css class name that the BEM Component mixin will use.

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Reference to the template file this component will use

fields.name: role
fields.description: Sets the role attribute

fields.name: color
fields.description:
Set the color the components text.

UXS ships with the following stock colors: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white. More can be added to the $defaultColors array.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

fields.name: style
fields.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white. More can be added to the $defaultColors array. This will set the background color of the component and set a contrasting base color for the text

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The text to return if the given value is empty

arguments.name: display
arguments.description:
Defines the type of layout this data component is presented in

UXS ships with the following display layouts: list, inline, tabel, cell

arguments.name: inset
arguments.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "inset" (inside padding) horizontally.

arguments.name: padded
arguments.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "offset" (outside padding) horizontally.

attributes.name: UXS Data Item
attributes.description:
A component to render a data item. Data Items can house lable, value and tips. They can also contain groups of values

{{uxs-data/item "My Label" "My Value" "My Tip"}}

{{#uxs-data/item as |item|}}
  {{item.label "My Label"}}
  {{item.value "My Value"}}
  {{item.tip "My Tip"}}
{{/uxs-data}}

fields.name: base
fields.description: The base css class name that the BEM Component mixin will use.

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Reference to the template file this component will use

fields.name: base
fields.description: The base css class name that the BEM Component mixin will use.

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Reference to the template file this component will use

fields.name: role
fields.description: Sets the role attribute

fields.name: color

UXS ships with the following stock colors: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white. More can be added to the $defaultColors array.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

fields.name: style

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white. More can be added to the $defaultColors array. This will set the background color of the component and set a contrasting base color for the text

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: label
arguments.description: Shortcut to defining the label text of this item

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The text to return if the given value is empty

arguments.name: display
arguments.description:
Defines the type of layout this data component is presented in

UXS ships with the following display layouts: list, inline, tabel, cell

arguments.name: inset
arguments.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "inset" (inside padding) horizontally.

arguments.name: padded
arguments.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "offset" (outside padding) horizontally.

arguments.name: tip
arguments.description: Shortcut to defining the tip text of this item

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Shortcut to defining the value text of this item

attributes.name: UXS Data Label
attributes.description:
A component to render a data label

{{#uxs-data/label "My Label"}}

fields.name: base
fields.description: The base css class name that the BEM Component mixin will use.

fields.name: style
fields.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white. More can be added to the $defaultColors array. This will set the background color of the component and set a contrasting base color for the text

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Reference to the template file this component will use

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, "left", "center", "right" or "justified". Defaults to no alignment (inheret)

arguments.name: inset
arguments.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "inset" (inside padding) horizontally.

arguments.name: padded
arguments.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "offset" (outside padding) horizontally.

arguments.name: size
arguments.description: Define the size of the component. Standard options are "giant", "huge", "large", "medium", "small", or "tiny". Defaults to no size (inhered)

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The text value for the label, this can be passed in at the first positional parameter

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description: Define the weight of the component. Standard options are "bold", "medium" or "light". Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXS DL
attributes.description:
A component to render ordered lists

{#uxs-dl as |list|}}
  {{list.term "Term One"}}
  {{list.description "Description"}}
  {{list.term "Term Two"}}
  {{list.description "Description"}}
  {{list.description "Another Description"}}
{{/uxs-dl}}

attributes.name: UXS Fab
attributes.description:
A component to render a simple fab button

{{uxs-fab "icon"}}

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to disable this button.

This will activate it's disabled style and also prevent any actions from being fired.

arguments.name: loading
arguments.description:
Set to true if the button has already been pressed or should be disabled while another action takes place.

If the loadingText argument has been provided this will be displayed, defaults to "Loading…".

This will activate it's loading style and also prevent any actions from being fired..

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
Add a custom name to your button, used for aria labels & test selectors.

By default this will be the same as the text argument unless you parse a different value.

arguments.name: selected
arguments.description:
Set's the button style to a selected state.

Can be used to toggle buttons or to infer an active state without disabling the buttons action.

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the button.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • regular
  • mini
  • extended

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.button--my-custom-style

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Set the color of the button.

UXS ships with the following stock color: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .button--my-custom-color

arguments.name: text
arguments.description:
The buttons text, this can be set as the first positional parameter.

It will also default to the components name.

arguments.name: fixed
arguments.description:
Where to fix this fab on the screen:

bottom-left bottom-right

attributes.name: UXS Form
attributes.description:
A component to render a form control

{{#uxs-form as |form|}}
  //...
{{/uxs-form}}

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to disable this form.

The disabled state will be passed to any child controls it yields.

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the form.

The style will be passed to any child controls it yields.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • filled
  • outlined

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.uxs-form--my-custom-style

arguments.name: onSubmit
arguments.description: Action to be called on the submission of the form

attributes.name: UXS Headline
attributes.description:
A typographic component to render headlines

{{uxs-headline "Lorem ipsum dolar" 3}}

{{#uxs-headline scale=3}}Lorem ipsum dolar"{{/uxs-headline}}

Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXS Icon
attributes.description:
Render a svg icon.

{{uxs-icon "path.to.svg"}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the icon.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • regular
  • large

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.uxs-icon--my-custom-style

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Set the color of the icon.

UXS ships with the following stock color: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .uxs-icon--my-custom-color

attributes.name: UXS List
attributes.description:
A component to render a resource list

{{#uxs-list as |list|}}
  {{list.item ...}}
{{/uxs-list}}

fields.name: base
fields.description: The base css class name 'uxs-list'

arguments.name: bordered
arguments.description: Set to true if this lists items should include a border

arguments.name: grow
arguments.description: Set to true if this list should grow to fit the flex box parent

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the splash component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .uxs-splash--my-custom-style

attributes.name: UXSListNotice
attributes.description:
Used in lists to highlight certain contexts. e.g. an active filter.

{{uxs-list as |list|}}
  {{list.notice text}}
{{/uxs-list}}

arguments.name: align
arguments.description:
Define the text alignment of the input

The following alignment options are supported:

  • left (default)
  • right
  • center
  • justify

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: Define the type of input

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to disable this text input.

The disabled state will just effect the visual appearance of the text input

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the text input.

UXS ships with the following styles:

  • filled
  • outlined

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. _.uxs-form__input--my-custom-style

arguments.name: prefixText
arguments.description: Add prefixed text the the input

arguments.name: suffixText
arguments.description: Add suffixed text the the input

arguments.name: prefixText
arguments.description: Add prefixed icon the the input

arguments.name: suffixText
arguments.description: Add suffixed icon the the input

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to disable this form.

The disabled state will be passed to any child controls it yields.

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description:
Set to true to render an invalid control

The invalid state will be passed to any child controls it yields.

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the form.

The style will be passed to any child controls it yields.

  • filled
  • outlined

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the component, will be used as the value for all test selectors. If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Sets the notices text string

arguments.name: icon
arguments.description: If set the notice will contain an icon on the left

arguments.name: actionText
arguments.description: If set the notice will contain a action button on the right

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .button--my-custom-style

arguments.name: onClick
arguments.description: This event is fired when the notice button is clicked. Requires actionText to be set. No params are set by default.

attributes.name: UXSMenu
attributes.description:
Display lists of links and actions in a menu

{{#uxs-menu as |menu|}}
  {{menu.link "Home" "index"}}
  {{menu.item "Maps"}}
  {{menu.item "Books"}}
  {{menu.item "Flights"}}
  {{menu.item "Apps"}}
{{/uxs-menu}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: bordered
arguments.description: If true, the menu will include a border

arguments.name: horizontal
arguments.description: If true, the menu will be displayed horizontally

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, "left", "center", "right" or "justified". Defaults to no alignment (inheret)

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: If set to true the menu items will be rendered small (detail) size

arguments.name: hasLeftIcon
arguments.description: If set to true the menu items & links will include a left padding to account for icons.

arguments.name: hasRightIcon
arguments.description: If set to true the menu items & links will include a right padding to account for icons.

arguments.name: hasSecondaryText
arguments.description: If set to true the menu items & links will include padding to account for secondary text.

attributes.name: UXSMenu/Item
attributes.description:
Display link to another route within a uxs-menu

{{#uxs-menu as |menu|}}
  {{menu.item "My Action" onClick=(action "somthing")}}
{{/uxs-menu}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: horizontal
arguments.description: If true, the link will be displayed horizontally

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: If set to true the link will be rendered small (detail) size

arguments.name: hasLeftIcon
arguments.description: If set to true the link will include a left padding to account for icons.

arguments.name: hasRightIcon
arguments.description: If set to true the link will include a right padding to account for icons.

arguments.name: rightIcon
arguments.description: If set the link will contain an icon on the right

arguments.name: leftIcon
arguments.description: If set the link will contain an icon on the left

arguments.name: onClick
arguments.description: The name of the action to fire on click

arguments.name: role
arguments.description: Set a role to the item for accessibility

arguments.name: hasSecondaryText
arguments.description: If set to true the item will include padding to account for secondary text.

arguments.name: secondaryText
arguments.description: Sets secondary text in the item

attributes.name: UXSMenu/Link
attributes.description:
Display link to another route within a uxs-menu

{{#uxs-menu as |menu|}}
  {{menu.link "My Route" "route.name"}}
{{/uxs-menu}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: horizontal
arguments.description: If true, the link will be displayed horizontally

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: If set to true the link will be rendered small (detail) size

arguments.name: hasLeftIcon
arguments.description: If set to true the link will include a left padding to account for icons.

arguments.name: hasRightIcon
arguments.description: If set to true the link will include a right padding to account for icons.

arguments.name: rightIcon
arguments.description: If set the link will contain an icon on the right

arguments.name: leftIcon
arguments.description: If set the link will contain an icon on the left

arguments.name: hasSecondaryText
arguments.description: If set to true the link will include padding to account for secondary text.

arguments.name: secondaryText
arguments.description: Sets secondary text in the link

attributes.name: UXS Nav Bar
attributes.description:
A component to render a navigation bar

{{#uxs-navbar as |bar|}}
  {{#bar.menu as |nav|}}
    {{nav.item "Home"}}
    {{nav.item "Account"}}
    {{nav.item "Logout"}}
  {{/bar.menu}}
{{/uxs-navbar}}

attributes.name: UXS Notice
attributes.description:
This component can be used to display some key info to a user before the main content is displayed.

{{uxs-notice text style=style truncated=truncated}}

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

attributes.name: UXS OL
attributes.description:
A component to render ordered lists

{#uxs-ol as |list|}}
  {{list.item "Item One"}}
  {{list.item "Item Two"}}
  {{list.item "Item Four"}}
{{/uxs-ol}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.
Defaults to no style (inheret from parents).

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
The name of the component. This property also used as the default value for the test selector attribute.
The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: scale
arguments.description:
Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXS OL/Item
attributes.description:
A component to render ordered list items

{{uxs-ol/item "Item One"}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.
Defaults to no style (inheret from parents).

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
The name of the component. This property also used as the default value for the test selector attribute.
The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: scale
arguments.description:
Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description:
The text content of the component
This can be passed in as the 1st positional parameter

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXS Overline
attributes.description:
A typographic component to render overline text

{{uxs-overline "Lorem ipsum dolar"}}

{{#uxs-overline}}Lorem ipsum dolar"{{/uxs-overline}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.
Defaults to no style (inheret from parents).

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
The name of the component. This property also used as the default value for the test selector attribute.
The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXSPaginationControls
attributes.description:
Used to provide controlls to change page or size of paginated data

{{uxs-pagination-controls
  size=model.meta.size
  page=model.meta.page
  total=model.meta.total
  style=style
  onChange=(action "paginateResults")
}}

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the component, will be used as the value for all test selectors. If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: resultsLabel
arguments.description: The text of the pagination label

arguments.name: countPrefix
arguments.description:
Add any text to the start of the "1 - 25 of 360" text.

e.g. "Showing 1 - 25 of 360"

arguments.name: countSuffix
arguments.description:
Add any text to the end of the "1 - 25 of 360" text.

e.g. "1 - 25 of 360 aliens"

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .button--my-custom-style

arguments.name: size
arguments.description: The size of a "page"

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The index of the current page

arguments.name: total
arguments.description: The total number of records

arguments.name: onChange
arguments.description: This event is fired when the user changes the page size or the next and prev buttons are clicked

attributes.name: UXS Pane
attributes.description:
A component to render group of buttons

{{#uxs-pane}}
  ...Content
{{/uxs-pane}}

fields.name: base
fields.description: The base css class name 'uxs-tabs'

arguments.name: aside
arguments.description: Set to true to display an aside style pane

arguments.name: detail
arguments.description: Set to true to display a detail style pane

arguments.name: index
arguments.description: Set to true to display an index style pane

arguments.name: main
arguments.description: Set to true to display a main style pane

arguments.name: order
arguments.description: Set the mobile order of the pane. 1 to 9 supported

arguments.name: padded
arguments.description: Set to true to add some padding to the pane

arguments.name: single
arguments.description: Set to true to display a single style pane

arguments.name: splash
arguments.description: Set to true to display a splash style pane

arguments.name: split
arguments.description: Set to true to display a split style pane

arguments.name: style
arguments.description:
Set the style of the panes background.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .uxs-pane--my-custom-style

arguments.name: type
arguments.description:
Set the type of pane, an alternative to using the bolean arguments for main, aside etc

UXS ships with the following stock pane types: aside, detail, index, main, single, splash & split.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. .uxs-pane--my-custom-type

{{uxs-subtitle "Lorem ipsum dolar" 2}}

{{#uxs-subtitle scale=2}}Lorem ipsum dolar"{{/uxs-subtitle}}

attributes.name: UXS Text
attributes.description:
A typographic component to render text

{{uxs-text "Lorem ipsum dolar" "headline-3"}}

{{#uxs-text type="overline"}}Lorem ipsum dolar"{{/uxs-text}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.

arguments.description:

Define the font-size of the component.

Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName

arguments.name: truncate

arguments.name: type
arguments.description:
Set to the name of the type scale you want to render. Available types are:

  • headline-1~6
  • subtitle-1~2
  • body-1~2
  • caption
  • overline
  • button

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXS Typography
attributes.description:
A typographic component to yield type components

{{#uxs-typography as |t|}}
  {{t.headline "Headline" 3 align="center"}}
  {{t.subtitle "A Subtitle"}}
  {{t.body "Adipiscing consequat a potenti a mollis suspendisse orci a id sagittis posuere vestibulum suspendisse suspendisse sed nisi.Odio." 1 true}}
{{/uxs-typography}}

arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

The name of the component. This property also used as the default value for the test selector attribute.
The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: scale
arguments.description:
Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: UXS OL/Item
attributes.description:
A component to render unordered list items

{{uxs-ul/item "Item One"}}

fields.name: layout
fields.description: Path to the component template file

arguments.name: align
arguments.description: The text align direction, 'left', 'center', 'right' or 'justified'. Defaults to no alignment (inheret from parents)

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: The BEM base name for this component

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
Adds a color modifier to the component.
Standard options are 'white', 'light', 'mid', 'grey', 'dark', 'primary', 'accent', 'success', 'warning' or 'error'.
Defaults to no style (inheret from parents).

arguments.name: name
arguments.description:
The name of the component. This property also used as the default value for the test selector attribute.
The default is true, which ensures the test selector is added.
If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

arguments.name: scale
arguments.description:
Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The html tag name for the root of the component

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description:
The text content of the component
This can be passed in as the 1st positional parameter

arguments.name: truncate
arguments.description: Set to true to truncate the text to one line

arguments.name: weight
arguments.description:
Define the weight of the component.
Standard options are 'bold', 'medium' or 'light'. Defaults to no weight (inhered)

attributes.name: Accessible
attributes.description: A mixin to add accesibility attributes to a component

fields.name: disabled
fields.description: Prevents the action from firing when true

fields.name: label
fields.description: Sets the an aria-label attribute

fields.name: hidden
fields.description: Sets the an aria-hidden attribute

fields.name: role
fields.description: Sets the role attribute

attributes.name: Alignable
attributes.description: Add a text align modifier to a component

fields.name: align
fields.description: The text align direction, "left", "center", "right" or "justified". Defaults to no alignment (inheret)

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

attributes.name: Clickable
attributes.description: A mixin to add click support to a component.

fields.name: onClick
fields.description: The name of the action to fire on click

fields.name: teak
fields.description: The name of the task performed on click

fields.name: role
fields.description: Add a role to the item for accessibility

fields.name: bubbles
fields.description: Return true to allow this components events to bubble to parent elements

accessors.name: label
accessors.description: Alias for the aria accesibility label

accessors.name: name
accessors.description: Default the component name to dasherized text If used in block format text will be null, so return true The name property should be set manually in block usage

attributes.name: Colorable
attributes.description: A mixing to give a common functionality to components to set text and style (backgrounds)

fields.name: color
fields.description:
Set the color the components text.

UXS ships with the following stock colors: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white. More can be added to the $defaultColors array.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

attributes.name: Datable
attributes.description: A mixing to give a common functionality to data components

fields.name: display
fields.description:
Defines the type of layout this data component is presented in

UXS ships with the following display layouts: list, inline, tabel, cell

fields.name: inset
fields.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "inset" (inside padding) horizontally.

fields.name: padded
fields.description: If set to true the data components content is displayed "offset" (outside padding) horizontally.

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

attributes.name: Groupable
attributes.description: A mixing to give grouped functionality to the component

fields.name: grouped
fields.description: Set to true if this component is part of a group

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

attributes.name: Scalable
attributes.description: A mixing to give a text scale modifier functionality to text components

fields.name: scale
fields.description:
Define the font-size of the component.
Available scales are body-1 (16px) & body-2 (14px)
Defaults to null (inherit font-size from parents)

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

attributes.name: Sizable
attributes.description: Add size modifier to a component

fields.name: size
fields.description: Define the size of the component. Standard options are "giant", "huge", "large", "medium", "small", or "tiny". Defaults to no size (inhered)

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

functions.name: registerModifiers
functions.description: This is a placeholder function that will be overridden by the registerModifiers function from BEMComponent mixin for any component that uses this mixin

attributes.name: Testable
attributes.description:
A mixin to add ember test selectors to a component.

This mixin adds an attribute binding to the component to produce a test selector.

By default these attributes are removed in production builds

fields.name: style
fields.description:
Set the style of the component.

UXS ships with the following stock styles: primary, accent, warning, error, dark, grey, mid, light & white.

You can customise your component by using any string here and adding your own css for the custom modifier e.g. --my-custom-style

fields.name: name
fields.description:
The name property is used as the value for test selectors.
For example the foo-component would have the following selector:

{{foo-component name="bar"}}

[data-test-foo="bar"]

The default is true, which adds the attribute with no value.

If set to false the test selector is not rendered.

fields.name: testSelectorName
fields.description:
By default a components base property is used as the value for test selectors. e.g.

{{foo-component base="foo"}}

[data-test-foo]

If you want the test selector to differ you can set it's testSelectorName e.g

{{foo-component base="foo" testSelectorName="bar"}}

[data-test-bar]

methods.name: _getTestSelectorName
methods.description: Find the test selector value for this element

methods.name: _defineAttributeBindings
methods.description: Add a attributeBindings computed property that will add base classes
